for t in [1, 0.1, 0.01, 0.001]:
    for lag in [None, [1, 2, 3]]:
        X = np.random.normal(loc=0, scale=np.sqrt(t), size=10000)
        bins = np.array([5000])
        powers = np.array([[1], [2]])
        bw = 0.15
        kmc, edges = km(X, kernel=kernels.epanechnikov, bw=bw, bins=bins,
            powers=powers)
        assert isinstance(kmc, np.ndarray)
        assert isinstance(edges[0], np.ndarray)
        kmc, edges = km(X, kernel=kernels.epanechnikov, bins=bins, powers=
            powers)
        assert isinstance(kmc, np.ndarray)
        assert isinstance(edges[0], np.ndarray)
